pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert R Graphics to Flash Animations // Using the 'Ming' library https://github.com/libming/libming to create Flash animations. Users can either use the 'SWF' device swf() to generate 'SWF' file directly through plotting functions like plot() and lines(), or convert images of other formats ('SVG', 'PNG', 'JPEG') into 'SWF'.
